i1.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Pyke's''' maximum health cannot increase except through [[Growth#Increasing_Statistics|growth (per level)]], instead he gains{{ft|{{as|1 '''bonus''' attack damage}} {{as|per 14 '''bonus''' health}}|{{as|({{fd|7.143}}% '''bonus''' health)}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}.

'''Pyke''' also stores {{pp|key=%|25 to 50}} of the damage he takes from enemy champions as ''Grey Health'' on his {{as|health bar}}, up to 80 {{as|(+ 800% '''bonus''' AD)}}, with an upper cap of {{as|60% of his '''maximum''' health}}.
When '''Pyke''' is unseen by enemies, he rapidly consumes his ''Grey Health'' to {{tip|heal}} for the same amount.
i1.notes:
* Game elements that increase health based on the champion's health (e.g {{ii|Cinderhulk}}, {{iis|Gargoyle Stoneplate}}, {{ri|Overgrowth}}) will increase the health before getting converted by ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'', thus granting increased {{as|bonus AD}}.
* {{ii|Spirit Visage}} and {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} take effect after ''Gift of the Drowned Ones's'' healing cap.
*'''Pyke's''' ''Grey Health'' does not have a time limit, and will stay on his {{as|health bar}} until '''Pyke''' leaves enemy vision or dies.
* Since '''Pyke's''' '''maximum''' health cannot be increased, ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'' reaches the upper cap of {{as|60% of '''maximum''' health}} at {{pp|(0.6*({{Data Pyke|pst2|hp_base}}+{{Data Pyke|pst2|hp_lvl}}*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1)))-80)/8|color=ad}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}.
* Amount of attack damage granted from list of items that grants health, converted with ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'':
{{stat table header|item}}{{Do for every item|item table row|p1n=2|p1v=pykehealth}}
{{stat table footer}}

q1.name: Bone Skewer
q1.target_range: {{pp|type=channel time|7|400;400 to 1100|0;0.5 to 1|displayformula=400+(140 per 0.1 seconds, starting at 0.5 seconds). ''This is capped at 1 second.''}}
description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Pyke''' {{ct|windup|winds up|cast=interrupts|items=false|consume=Disabled, but can use trinkets}} for up to 3 seconds, increasing ''Bone Skewer's'' range by up to 700 units while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 20%.

{{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Pyke''' {{tip|projectile|hurls}} his harpoon, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to the first enemy struck, {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them a fixed 550 units towards him and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 90% for 1 second.
Releasing the ability within {{fd|0.5}} seconds causes '''Pyke''' to instead thrust his harpoon, hitting the closest enemy unit, prioritizing enemy champions.

If '''Pyke''' is interrupted during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, ''Bone Skewer'' is cancelled and the ability is put on full cooldown but refunds {{sti|mana|{{as|half the mana cost}}}}.
q1.notes:
* Since the pull is a fixed distance, '''Pyke''' will throw enemies behind him if he uses the ability at close range. 
* If '''Pyke''' casts the ability while it's on cooldown he will be unable to receive movement or attack commands for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
* {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} will only block the charged ability.

w1.name: Ghostwater Dive
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pyke''' enters {{tip|camouflage}} and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays over 5 seconds. Enemies are notified if '''Pyke''' is within X-units of them.
Attacking or casting abilities immediately ends {{tip|camouflage}}.
w1.notes:
* When '''Pyke''' is hidden nearby in his ''Ghostwater Dive'', sharks will circle underneath nearby enemies' feet and a sound will be played, changing based on the amount of health they have left.
** Enemies will hear a disturbing deadly warning tone if their health bar is under the threshold of ''Death from Below''.

effects.str: • Bonus Movement Speed: % (+ 1.5% per 1 Lethality)

e1.name: Phantom Undertow
description: After 1 second, the phantom returns to '''Pyke''', {{tip|stun|stunning}} enemies it passes through for {{fd|1.25}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.1}} per 10 Lethality)}} seconds. Enemy champions also take {{as|physical damage}}.

r1.name: Death from Below
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pyke''' marks the targeted area with an X which he strikes after a {{fd|0.75}} second delay, {{as|executing|true damage}} enemy {{tip|champions}} below {{pp|250;290;330;370;400;430;450;470;490;510;530;540;550|6 to 18}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}} per 1 Lethality)}} {{as|health}} while dealing 50% of the amount as {{as|physical damage}} to enemies not within the threshold for execution.

If ''Death from Below'' hits an enemy champion or one dies inside it, '''Pyke''' will {{tip|blink}} to the center of the X. For the latter case '''Pyke''' also gains the ability to recast within 20 seconds at no cost.

Each ''execution'' grants one {{ii|'Your Cut'}} to both '''Pyke''' and the last assisting ally, instead of its natural assist gold. In addition, each enemy champion killed inside the X by an ally grants '''Pyke''' two stacks of {{ii|'Your Cut'}}.
r1.notes:
* {{ii|'Your Cut'}} is an item that can be consumed to gain gold. If the ally's inventory is full, it's auto-consumed.
** When {{ii|'Your Cut'}} is consumed, it quickly grants {{g|100}} stacks until reaching the full gold value.
* Only the target's current health will count as '''Pyke's''' damage in post-game statistics and {{sti|spell vamp}} healing if executed.
** If the target's current health is less than 50% of the {{tt|post-mitigation|after damage modifiers}} non-executing damage, '''Pyke''' will heal less from spell vamp.
